website_summaries.verdict: Iconic and recognizable classic basketball shoe that's built a reputation for durability and traction.
pros: Have become fashionable shoes because of the classic three stripe look
Can be worn with sweats or casual clothing
cons: There are better choices of basketball shoes for women

customer_reviews.title: Not actual Adidas
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are faux Adidas. They came in a brown box with no tags. The shoes have no adidas label on the tongue of the shoe indicating they are not actual Adidas.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Get the real deal, don't wast your money
customer_reviews.text: Noticable glue edges. Stains on the strips. Awful waste of 70 Bucks. Feel like they are a complete knock off and I'm never picky about this stuff. This were an ideal shoe until the arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE NOT FAKE
customer_reviews.text: I watched many videos on real vs fake and so I knew what to look out for and I included those pictures. I also went to a local footlocker and they did tell me you have to size down because they run really big. The Macy's website says the same thing. I wear a size 6 1/2 so I tried on a 5 1/2 and they fit perfect!! So I went ahead and ordered them from Amazon for $20 less. I hope this is helpful to those who want these sneakers and are a bit skeptical. I hope the pictures help!! I'm in love with them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Are these even real???
customer_reviews.text: These must not be real. The women's shoe has SIX eyelets and the pair I received has seven. I checked to see if they were men's (which has seven eyelets) but they are not. The tag says 12, which is my size in WOMEN'S. I am very irate right now and I feel scammed. I just spent $70 and a ton of time waiting for a product that I'm not satsfied with.
customer_reviews.author: Rashelle Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: but they are great! I wore them to a concert yesterday and ...
customer_reviews.text: I read the comment for these shoes and order a full sized down and they fit perfectly, I'm normally a 9 and got an 8 and have wide feet, but they are great! I wore them to a concert yesterday and they were super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Psyche Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Fake Adidas
customer_reviews.text: After two weeks the color (gold) started to fade. One shoe on the inside you couldn't read the Adidas no longer after one month of use. I compared them to my sister's adidas and to a friends and they are different, we concluded mines are copies in both comparisons. I payed 79$ because your product says they're originals.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Zubi

customer_reviews.title: Love these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Legit! Love these sneakers. SUPER comfy and they don’t tear up the back of my ankle like Converse do. I’m an 8.5, and I bought an 8.5. Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: K. H.

customer_reviews.title: A great shoe for sitting around and looking pretty in
customer_reviews.text: If you actually want to, I don't know, walk around in them, then pass these shoes by. I tried them on a short (less than a mile) walk around my building, and by the end, I had open, raw blisters in both my heels. The toe-box hit the tops of my toes on every step, and the arch support was completely non-existent. I wanted a classier look for site-seeing in Europe, but I'll stick to my Brooks.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky Kayaker

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The white / black stripes arrived in an authentic Adidas box. I am usually between a 9 and a 9.5. Based on others’ reviews, I ordered a 9. I was hopeful though skeptical about the arch support. I have struggled with plantar fasciitis for a few years. I was pleasantly surprised by these shoes! Super cute AND good arch support! I am a happy girl!!!
customer_reviews.author: HealthyMama

customer_reviews.title: Fantastical!
customer_reviews.text: A little larger than I expected but size can vary with shoes. I opened the box and thought I had received the wrong size because they looked HUGE (I ordered a women's size 5.5). But I put them on and they're just a teeny bit big for me. Not too big that I'm returning them though, they work. They're extremely comfortable. I have flat feet (no arches) and these help me a lot when it comes to foot pain whilst walking. Plus, they're just dang cute.
customer_reviews.author: Napoleon

customer_reviews.title: Size DOWN
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 6.5 regular shoe and 7.5 sneaker. Due to the other reviews, I ordered a size 6. It was way too tight. Even though they looked extra cute, my big toe was touching the end in the toe box, and had no where to go, so I returned and ordered a 6.5. Perfect! There is a comfortable amount of room in the shoe without any heal slippage. So like the majority of reviewers stated, size down. If you are like me and have two different sizes (athletic and regular shoe) size down from your athletic shoe. You'll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Just Too Narrow to Keep
customer_reviews.text: Truthfully I was conflicted about whether to return or not. I have problem feet, so I’m very sensitive to fit. The arch was slightly forward from my own, which I think I could have overcome but should I have to? The width was much more narrow than my foot liked, too. I really “ felt it” when I took the shoe off. I really wanted to like this shoe, and I did, but in the end I couldn’t justify the off fit with the cost.
customer_reviews.author: D. Steppe

customer_reviews.title: ORIGINAL!
customer_reviews.text: This is all authentic. The reason why it’s more cheaper than in the Adidas is because Amazon buys it in bulk (I contacted Adidas about this). Just make sure you are purchasing from “Adidas Originals” and not from other sellers. When it comes to the size, go half down a size than your actual size. I bought this because my old superstar is dirty and I got it in 7 1/2 (it’s loose and too big for me too). I ordered this in 7 and it fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: These are great, stop complaining
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what these people are complaining about with their dumb reviews. It's a regular adidas shoe and fits very well, if you order the right size. I am a 6.5/7 normally and ordered the 7 and wear no-show socks with them, thin ones and it's a great fit. They are super comfortable and I love the classic style. I waited til they went on sale $50 vs. $75, so it was a great deal. Love em!
customer_reviews.author: MelZ

customer_reviews.title: This is not Amazon's fault - the tags are wrong!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are labeled on the tongue as the US size 6 equivalent, however, a UK size 4 1/2 is actually closer to a US 6 1/2 (I tried them on to make sure). I normally wear US 5 1/2 M/B; some 6 M if they are to be worn with socks in winter. These are a 1/2 size too large and will be gifted to a young woman at my church whose birthday is approaching. The shoes are in impeccable condition and gorgeous- but too big. :(
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Took advice from other reviews and ordered half size down
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! I wasn't sure what size to get so ordered a half size down after I read several reviews. For reference, I normally wear 7 in casual/dressy shoes and 7.5 in running shoes (asics). I ordered a 6.5 in the Superstars and am glad I did. There might be a little room at the toe, but it's not enough to bother me. I work at a preschool and was looking for a shoe that has comfort and support yet somewhat stylish as well. I normally wear chuck taylors (a favorite for sure) but walking around all day I need a little more support, the superstars definitely have it. Great shoe and so cute!!
customer_reviews.author: JessicaWalsh

customer_reviews.title: but are overall pretty comfortable and quite stylish
customer_reviews.text: I usually am an 8 in shoes and an 8.5 in boots and sneakers, but I took the advice in other reviews and ordered an 8, and they fit perfectly. They require a bit of breaking in, but are overall pretty comfortable and quite stylish! I really like how they look and I'm sure once I break them in they'll be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tegan

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: These looked good online on other people's feet, but when I tried them on they just didn't do it for me. There's no arch support, not very comfortable to walk in and just overall not that attractive on me. This is not to say they won't be nice on someone else. Also, they didn't come in the Adidas box and they looked like they were tried on before. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Magical Everyday

customer_reviews.title: FAKE for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. These cane in an Adidas box but are cheap knock offs. No original Adidas tags. Stripes are off. Oversized. Liners inside are warped and dont fit correctly. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: BLOmomof6

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, great condition, authentic, I ordered a 9.5 and normally wear a 10. 4 is because the right shoe is weird. For some reason the adidas on the back digs into my achilles. But just the righy shoe, and thos is my 3rd pair of Adidias so im more convinced it is the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Smith4.5

customer_reviews.title: They fit good but...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about the whole size problem because mine fit good, but feet can grow bigger and change over time. If you happen to be over the age of 40 your feet can grow half a shoe size every 10 years. Even the Tendons and Ligaments lose their elastiicity. Lower arches etc...No matter what age you are you should measure your feet. Don't you love a new pair of shoes?! But white shoes, I'm afraid of getting them dirty. I got some shoe protector spray and some white shoe polish, just in case. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Desert Summer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I read that these on Amazon were fakes and the reviews were from so called verified purchasers. I returned them only because I needed a half size smaller 10.5 and Amazon didn't have. I'm usually an 11. The statements claiming these were fakes mentioned the holes in between the black stripes not going all the way thru the leather and something about the numbering on the inner tongue near scan code supposed to be different. Untrue, I went that night to the local Adidas store bought the same shoe and compared them. Same Identical shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jill H.

customer_reviews.title: Funky Fresh Shelltops!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter, and she loves them. I used to have an original pair of these shoes back when I was in high school in the early 1980's, rocking them with my pair of two-tone Jordache jeans. So it's nice to see that the style is still around today. My daughter wears a size-8 and they fit perfectly. Shelltop Adidas are still alive and well in this generation.
customer_reviews.author: Dale R.Top Contributor: Action Figures

customer_reviews.title: Size down, they are huge
customer_reviews.text: I have had a pair of Adidas shell toe sneakers for 20 years and just threw them out due to wear. I purchased these new ones, the same size I’ve have for 20 years, and all of a sudden these are huge on my feet. I feel like I need to go down a complete size to have them fit comfortably. Did adidas all of a sudden change their sizing???
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Burrier

customer_reviews.title: Make her pay for them
customer_reviews.text: Oh she had to have them , loved them soooooo much she gave them to her sister vfc after 2months, maybe 25 wears. But she's got different kinda shoes she can give away before she's barefoot...
customer_reviews.author: Dozer

customer_reviews.title: IT IS FAKE!!! DON'T BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same shoes (5.5 women superstar with same color and size) from amazon and Adidas' official website. When comparing them, I found the amazon Adidas shoes are fake ones!!! The looks are similar. But the size of the fake ones is smaller and tighter than the real ones. The material is totally different. The uppers and soles fake one is made of cheap synthetic material. It is very uncomfortable. DON'T BUY THEM IF YOU WANT REAL ADIDAS!!! DON'T TRUST 'AMAZON'S CHOICE'!!!
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made very cute but still large I had to return my first pair they were way too big on average on a size 7 I had to order a size 6 I should have gone with a five and a half I will say Amazon made it very easy to return them and get another pair I'm very happy with them if I purchased these again I will be buying I have a size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Gunny Girl

customer_reviews.title: Sizing information is wrong
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed to receive these and see that the sizing chart used gave me the wrong information on my correct size. These were HUGE. I wear a US size 9 (European 39), my correct size per Adidas is 7.5 but the sizing info provided is completely misleading and that was not the size I ordered. I missed out on buying the correct size at a great reduced price because of this. NOT HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: Goochie1978

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! I had another pair of these exact shoes I bought from an adidas store 5 years ago, and they were dying on me, so I bought this pair to replace them. I did my comparisons because as usual on many amazon products, people say they are fakes, THESE ARE NOT FAKE. They are the same shoes. They fit great. True to size. I love these shoes they are classic and go with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but weird waistband
customer_reviews.text: These leggings fit well, are comfortable and look good but it was only after my first wear i realised how strange the waistband is. The fold, where the elastic is attached to the legs is not sewn down so the waistband folds upwards as you wear them. The more the leggings move as you walk, the more the edge wants to fold due to friction. I still like them but will have to put a few stitches in the waist to secure it. It's annoying. Feels like the pants are unfinished. Disappointing for a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: DelicateZaphira

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite shoes. Adidas fit me better than any other brand......last longer and much more comfortable than any others. I’ve purchased several pair and know to buy 1/2 size smaller than other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Stillwell

customer_reviews.title: Buy your normal size
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 10 (women's). Based on other reviews I ordered a full size down, a 9. It was too small. I think I should have ordered my correct size. Currectly returning them. Will buy my correct size if the price for the size 10 drops. There is a $30 difference between the size 9 and size 10..?
customer_reviews.author: Emily B

customer_reviews.title: Not FAKES!!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are real ADIDAS! I don't know if other people just got a crappy pair of shoes but mine came in a Adidas box and they are they real deal! And I got them at an amazing price!
customer_reviews.author: Maegan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people on here are saying these are fake Adidas but mine came in an Adidas box with Adidas tissue paper and had no visible flaws that make it seem like it's not authentic. If these are fake I would never know the difference. They fit maybe a half size too big but that's typical with these types of sneakers. I think these are worth the buy if you want a pair of superstars.
customer_reviews.author: LYNETTE C. HARTMANN

customer_reviews.title: Something is off on these,  I wear a 7 and these are too big
customer_reviews.text: And the overall fit is awkward.....not only just too big. I always wear a 7 and I literally walk out of these when I have them on. They are also a little narror for my average width foot. Something is just not right, are these real adidas I don't know, but I don't like them
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dear

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!!! They are so comfortable and stylish. I read the reviews and decide to go a size down, I'm glad that I did cause they fit perfect (I normally wear size 10 - 9,5 and I got a size 9). Fast shipping with prime also!
customer_reviews.author: CatWoman

customer_reviews.title: Happy Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with my purchase, but definitely buy a full size smaller than what you usually wear. I usually wear a 7.5 in all my shoes and I ordered a 6.5 because of all the other reviews and it fits perfectly. As you can see in the pictures, mine came in the blue Adidas box so it’s seem very legit to me. I love these shoes, it’s very comfortable and it matches with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Feng

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Ugh I'm so obsessed. Definitely recommend😍 I'm usually a size nine but I ordered an 8.5 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Roubinian

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes for casual wear
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes for casual wear. Glad I read the reviews, so do go down a size. I wear an 11, but I got a 10-10.5 and they still feel a little roomy, but that's fine, just means I can wear them longer.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vasser

customer_reviews.title: but I'm still allowed to be disappointed, right
customer_reviews.text: As in the description the exterior is not leather, so it is as described....but I'm still allowed to be disappointed, right? It changed the whole fit and breaking in of the shoe. Also the Interior is more rough than my other Superstars that were all leather...so something with design was cheaper and hurts my ankle if I don't have tall enough socks. SO the solution is to wear them less often and with taller socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size down after reading some reviews and they don't fit well at all. Had to return them. Sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Alex In Chains

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Big
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a size 8 and these shoes look huge on me. People kept telling me my feet looked way to large for my body and it was because of the shoes. I had so much wiggle room, I should have ordered a size 7 or 6.5.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: True to size super nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy the big kid superstars because it’s cheaper but these ones are on sale right now so I bought these. For reference, I’m a size 8 in Nike’s so I wear a size 8 in adidas, it’s a little loose in the heel but I don’t mind that because I have plenty of room in the toe area which is usually my concern with shoes since I have wider feet. Super comfortable would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: xin qian

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little small! should of went up a 1/2 size. Not Comfortable at all!!! Could not wear all day. If I didn't wear them I would return them!! Too pricey to hurt my feet, was expecting more comfort from them! Wish I could get my money back! Look cute on my feet though.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Suggs

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! I've always loved the classic shell toes! I will say reading the reviews did help when choosing a size. I'm normally a size 7, so I ordered a 6 since all the reviews said "run large" and they fit perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not True to size
customer_reviews.text: the shoes where not a true to size womens 9 more like a 10 they were super wide as well. Very light not sure if they are a real or fake! Not happy waited long for them only to have to send them back!
customer_reviews.author: Lee-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Adidas quality shoes! Be careful ordering, half size too big.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Very much what I expected from Adidas. Great quality. I gave 4 stars only because the 7 I ordered fits more like a 7 1/2. I’ve purchased some no show , no slip pegs. Hoping they will help fit me better,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love buying shoes online
customer_reviews.text: Me and my child both have large feet and our size is NEVER in stock at normal shoe stores. These are awesome and so much easier than hunting at the mall
customer_reviews.author: Damsel-in-Disarray

customer_reviews.title: Navy-purplish with a hint of sparkle.  Great color! Not black.
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, I thought I was ordering BLACK stripes so I was a little surprised to see these arrive! I went back to look at my order to see what I bought. Not black, BUT I love this color! It’s called purple night, but I’d say it’s kind of a sparkly navy with a hint of purple. It’s part of a Christmas present so I hope my daughter likes the color as much as I do, because unfortunately, her feet have grown past mine by a long shot so I cannot even wear these!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzi in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cool!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears these to school all the time. She loves them. She is some what flat footed with very little Arch and these do not hurt at all.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: They FIT!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Adidas!!! I’m 5’9” & wear a Woman’s size 11 or 12. Usually I have to buy mens sneakers...but these fit like a glove! Did not purchase for athletics. Wear to look cool at my nephews Varsity HS & AAU basketball games! Ha! The boys all wear Nikes! I’ve always been an Adidas fan.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi Kaso

customer_reviews.title: These are knockoffs!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this style of adidas because it has been sold out all summer, but was very disappointed to realize that they are fake. I noticed right away that they are slightly smaller than my other adidas superstars in the same size, and the interior is leather (well, fake leather) instead of fabric. The shoelaces are also different, and when I tried them on in my room and walked around, they made an awful squeaking noise. Can't wait to return these!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted these shoes for a long time. I had several pair many years ago and was so excited to see they had returned! Great fit. Looks good with jeans, workout gear and even leather pants. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 6 and bought a 6 they fit perfect as always, these are real converse
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Real or not?
customer_reviews.text: I did get these in a plain brown box. Although they look very authentic to me I'm not really sure what to compare them too. After reading the reviews with the plain brown box I plan to take these to the store to get them verified. I will finish my review based on what they say. I did order a full size down. I normally wear a size 7 and ordered a 6. That was PERFECT. They fit absolutely perfect. I'm really hoping they are authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Michealan

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great right now..
customer_reviews.text: I bought same pair few years ago and absolutely loved them, but now their goo but not great. The shoes came with a lot of glue sticking out on it. I tried tweezing the excess off but hard to do without damaging the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE! They are a bit loose if you want to wear the the laces like I do. They are also very easy to clean with a magic eraser!
customer_reviews.author: LoriL9182

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking, Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These were for my granddaughter. She read reviews and determined that she would have to size down by 1/2 for a perfect fit. She did and loves them. They look great on her feet and are very comfortable for her. She loves the look and they are perfect for walking around campus. She is very stylish and these made her more than happy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: So cute. I’m usually just above a size 10 (not quite a 10.5). The 10’s fit a tiny bit big and they’re so comfy! Super happy with the purchase and size.
customer_reviews.author: Singing377

customer_reviews.title: Feet not happy
customer_reviews.text: I wore the shoes for a week I kept wondering why I wasn't able to wear socks with shoes I ordered too big. I ordered size 10.5 the box says 10.5 but I looked in the shoes they are a size too small 9.5 Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Fakes! $20 to return 🤬
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the leopard stripe, they came in the blue Adidas box but they were clearly a cheaper knock off cleverly disguised. They were also a full size too big. Upon trying to return, the return label required need to pay which was $20. I ordered the leopard stripe, they came in the blue Adidas box but they were clearly a cheaper knock off cleverly disguised. They were also a full size too big. Upon trying to return, the return label required need to pay which was $20. super annoyed...
customer_reviews.author: Lara Willard

customer_reviews.title: They do run big...
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! So cute on! I did have to go down a size but once the right size came they are great. No question on authenticity. So comfortable as well, can't wait for spring!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dono

customer_reviews.title: Love the look wear as casual footwear not arch support
customer_reviews.text: I bought to replace pair I had worn out. They are great for everyday casual wear; but not so much for athletic use; while they are well constructed, have only minimal arch support. They are comfortable and I like the way they look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep Making Them!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my granddaughters Favorite shoes so whenever she needs a new pair I buy them for her! I hope they’ll always be around!
customer_reviews.author: KAREN L.

customer_reviews.title: Go down a size.
customer_reviews.text: I believe mine are true ADIDAS. I wear 7 1/2 - 8. I ordered a 6 1/2. Fits great! At first a little snug with cushion on width, but became loser and fine, in one time of wearing. If I would have ordered. 7, I believe they would be way to big.
customer_reviews.author: LorilA

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fit pretty big.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit pretty big...I usually wear an 8.5 so I got an 8 and they were a little big, but I wore them for a few hours and got used to the roominess. They are beautiful and stylish, and once you get used to the extra roominess they are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Cheag

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit, not as comfortable as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these, they were a little larger than I expected, ordered my regular size but they fit almost perfect to me although I read most people had to order one size smaller than usual. Although they are DEFINITELY not as comfortable as I expected, the upper side (where the shoelaces are) hurts my feet after a while of using them, which is kind of bad for a sports footwear, I tried loosing them up, but it seems like is the fabric and not how tight they are.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra A.

customer_reviews.title: Size isn’t accurate.
customer_reviews.text: These were about two sizes too big. The workmanship on the shoe is great. They are well made shoes. But, their sizes need to reflect all other shoe sizes or they will get returned.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Size is accurate. Beautiful, classic.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the torquoise stripes! The stripes are made of soft leather. My shoe size is 6.5 and the shoe fit is accurate. These sneakers are a beautiful classic.
customer_reviews.author: nBrix

customer_reviews.title: Size down.
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, they're a classic. Great quality and durability. If you're unsure what size to order, size down. I wear a 6.5-7 depending on the shoe, I purchased a size 6 and these fit like a 7. Just FYI for the unsure buyer. I should have purchased a 5.5, but I'm keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: J_B_Cran

customer_reviews.title: Heel kinda slips up and down a bit
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the shoes 2x to exchange for a smaller size. Keep in mind I wear thin socks. I usually wear a size 8 women’s shoes and I ended up with a 6.5 for this pair. The heal is a bit low so it slips a bit and doesn’t stay on my heel that’s why I gave it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: $81 for a pair of used shoes!?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. My wife is a big fan of these shoes and I have ordered from here 3 others times but this most recent purchase they sent me a pair of very obviously used and worn shoes for $81. Absolutely ridiculous. Won’t be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: As expected!
customer_reviews.text: These are the real thing, at least my classic black and whites were. They came in an adidas box and I did end up getting a half size smaller because these shell toes have always run big since they came out originally. Happy with my purchase, it’s what I expected and shipping was pretty quick!
customer_reviews.author: CaliCatt

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these shoes. I have wide flat feet and bought these based on reviews for wide feet. After wearing these for a couple hours I have a bruise across my toes from where the shell toe ended from rubbing. My arch aches from the low arch support. I did wear socks, which makes me think that the bruise would worse had I not had socks on. Three days later and It’s still pretty painful and makes walking difficult. I’m hoping my foot heals quicly. In the end the pain was not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JessWinks

customer_reviews.title: My big toe touches the top but they are comfortable and I love the style
customer_reviews.text: Everyone said they run large so I did order a half size smaller. My big toe touches the top but they are comfortable and I love the style.
customer_reviews.author: Noel R

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I felt compelled to write a positive review for this seller and product after reading some negative ones. Don’t be misled by the nay sayers. These shoes are real, true to size and perfect. Great value for a great shoe! They fit perfectly and are authentic. They came in the blue Adidas shoe box as well.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: but i love them! Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little big, but i love them! Comfortable and stylish. Fit just like any other Adidas Originals.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are a gift for my daughter. She wears this style with everything and we are on our 4th or 5th pair of this color. They came beautifully wrapped and perfectly packaged. Hopefully she’ll let me throw out the old ones that have been through heck and back.
customer_reviews.author: Sheepdogs&Poodles=SheepaDoodles

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, but they run a bit large
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, but they ran a tad bit large for me. I wear a 7 but I could've gone down to a 6 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice Ward

customer_reviews.title: and the exchange process was extremely easy! The shoes themselves are a nice product
customer_reviews.text: Although these shoes fit as expected since they are unisex, it was difficult to know which size online applied to a man or a woman. I ordered the wrong one, and the exchange process was extremely easy! The shoes themselves are a nice product, however, they will take some 'wearing in' as the soles do not have alot of give
customer_reviews.author: Cory Fink

customer_reviews.title: Shoe should not be considered narrow
customer_reviews.text: Returned shoe . It filtered as narrow , however was too wide for narrow
customer_reviews.author: Sheila D

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these shoes previously that I wore out and had to get rid of. Bought a new pair and they are still just as comfy and cute as the first pair I had!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective Left Sneaker Arch/poor company customer service
customer_reviews.text: The left sneaker insole arch support was so high it hurt my foot and was painful to walk in. Very disappointed in company customer service as they didnt accommodate my requests.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson F.

customer_reviews.title: BIG shoes
customer_reviews.text: V trendy shoes but keep in mind that this is NOT rose gold!!! it's more of a copper-gold. Also, Adidas classicaly run a half size large, so definitely order an 8/5 if you're a 9, like I am! Very wide toebox and very wide shoe. I have somewhat narrow feet with collapsing arches and these were not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Do you love comfort?
customer_reviews.text: If you love comfort and love feeling like you are walking on a cloud, please drop everything and buy these shoes right now. WORTH IT. Just buy a half size smaller to ensure proper fit.
customer_reviews.author: TMH_PARTY

customer_reviews.title: Stiff but still good shoes
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with these are that they are extremely stiff and it begins to hurt the ankles. Other than that, super cute and comfortable on the feet!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Pawly

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wifey and she loves it. The price of this item stays quite stable.
customer_reviews.author: Tyasla

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying shoes online. However, these came on time and in perfect condition. The quality was better than anticipated and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Willow Riverside

customer_reviews.title: Runs at least a full size and half large
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are much larger than the size listed. I wore them for almost a day and ended up with blisters on the side of my heels from the shoe moving up and down. Very unfortunate since I cannot return them at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Kate M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not for hours and hours of wear.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a shoe I could wear all day unless I was sitting. It is cute but not so comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Gibson

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 90s kid so I was so excitred tonse e these shoes coming back into style. I ordered an 8.5 Which is what I usually wear but they were way too big on me. Went to an 8 and they are still a little roomy but work for me.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: A little to big for me
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item because a 6.5 was to big for me. I ordered them cause a few people I know have them and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice kicks
customer_reviews.text: They are a classic. Nothing more nothing less Bought them four my woman, she was happy and wearing them as I type this
customer_reviews.author: E.Q.

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!! Size down!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! I'm so happy I read the reviews and sized down. I'm a size 7us and ordered a size 6. They fit great! I'm glad I went a whole size down instead of half a size. They are super cute! The package was kind of damaged and taped but the product was fine!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered and Fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my daughter, the shoes fit true to size. Also, very fast delivery! Thanks so much and Merry Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: chatticathi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Cute, comfy, and good for long walks. I got a 10 but could have gotten away with my correct size of 9.5. During the winter the extra space will allow for thicker wool socks so I dont mind it. They manage to look good with just about anything which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: . Mueller

customer_reviews.title: FAKE AF!
customer_reviews.text: FAKE FAKE AND FAKE! I know originals from the fake and I received FAKE ONES and I’m PISSED!
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect NW Everyday Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Like it all! Water proof in the NW and trendy. My daughter has thick, sorta wide feet so we move up a whole size and they are great!
customer_reviews.author: AggShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted these shoes for a while and finally splurged. I was a little worried based on some of the reviews, but these shoes are great! They arrived in a genuine adidas box with the tag still attached. The fit is great for my needs. I got my actual size and when I tightened up the laces the fit was just right.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Malaga

customer_reviews.title: Love my new kicks
customer_reviews.text: Love my new kicks. Comfortable, fit right, and really cute. I am typically an 8.5, that's the size I ordered and the fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann S.

product_meta.title: adidas Originals Women's Superstar Sneaker
product_meta.description: The adidas Superstar sneaker reigns supreme. The fan favorite launched in 1969 and quickly lived up to its name as NBA players laced into the now-famous shell-toe design. These men's shoes come in full grain leather with serrated 3-Stripes and a rubber cupsole.
feature_bullets: Synthetic leather lining for soft comfort
Enjoy the comfort and performance of OrthoLite sockliner
